item.description:
More political action. Lots going on 2/21.

Â 

Liberty Day at the state house: February 21st 2013
---
A GUN Ban to OPPOSE, A study cmte to oppose:
Constitutional Carry to SUPPORT as well as other bills

CRIMINAL JUSTICE AND PUBLIC SAFETY, Representatives Hall
10:00 a.m. HB 290-FN, prohibiting unlicensed persons from openly carrying a pistol or revolver in a public building.

11:00 a.m. HB 609, relative to possession of a firearm on school property.

1:00 p.m. HB 451-FN, repealing the license requirement for carrying a concealed pistol or revolver.

2:00 p.m. HB 396, establishing a committee to study requiring safety training or instruction prior to the purchase or acquisition of a firearm.
---
Also a chance to attend the
NDAA hearing HB399 10:00am in LOB203
Please add this to your calendar and show up!
item.name: Liberty Day at the state house: February 21st 2013
